products.brandedName: Nike Life Men's Carpenter Overalls in Brown, Size: Medium | FN3120-281
products.unbrandedName: Life Men's Carpenter Overalls in Brown, Size: Medium | FN3120-281
products.description: Pull on these rugged carpenter overalls from our Nike Life collection and put in the work. Inspired by the workwear classic, they're built to last with heavy canvas and brass rivets reinforcing high-wear areas. The fit is loose through the body and seat to keep you feeling good and moving easy throughout the day. Nike Life Collection:The Nike Life collection features timeless workwear and menswear designs, made with all the quality materials and precision craft of the originals and reimagined for your daily lifestyle outside of sport. Tough Build:Heavyweight cotton canvas is rugged and durable while staying breathable. Brass rivets, double-needle stitching and double-knee design reinforce high-wear areas. Easy Fit:Designed to feel roomy through the body, seat and legs for easy movement and layering. The straight-leg cut provides a casual fit that pairs well with sneakers or work boots. More Benefits:Shoulder straps with shank button adjusters help you secure the right fit. Product Details:Front flap pocket with snap closure. Double-front apron pocket. Front and back patch pockets. Carpenter pocket on right leg. Hammer loop on left leg. Nike Life label of quality on inside back. Nike Life buttons. 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported. products.name: Rope Sneaker
products.brandedName: Valentino Rope Sneaker
products.description: Introducing the Valentino Rope Sneaker, a true epitome of signature elegance with a modern aesthetic. Crafted by the renowned brand Valentino, this fashion-forward shoe brings together impeccable Italian craftsmanship and contemporary design.Please note that size selections for the Valentino Rope Sneaker are based on European sizing. To find the perfect fit, please refer to our size chart for accurate US conversions. Feedback from our valued members has indicated that this brand often runs small, so we recommend sizing up a half size for most styles.Made in Italy, these sneakers showcase a unique and eye-catching design. The bright orange woven rope upper, combined with a contrasting suede tongue, creates a striking visual appeal that is sure to turn heads. The lace-up closure ensures a secure and customized fit, while the lightly padded insole provides cushioning and comfort throughout the day.Built for both style and functionality, the Valentino Rope Sneaker features a durable rubber sole with traction. This ensures excellent grip and stability on various surfaces, allowing you to confidently navigate any environment. At our store, authenticity is our utmost priority. While we source some of our merchandise from trusted independent suppliers, we guarantee the authenticity of every product sold on our site. Rest assured that the Valentino Rope Sneaker is 100% genuine and embodies the exceptional quality that Valentino is renowned for.Elevate your footwear collection with the Valentino Rope Sneaker. From its Italian craftsmanship to its unique design elements, this shoe is a true fashion statement that effortlessly blends style and comfort. Shop now and step into luxury with Valentino.

products.name: Nike Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in White, Size: 5.5 | FJ2572-100
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in White, Size: 5.5 | FJ2572-100
products.unbrandedName: Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in White, Size: 5.5 | FJ2572-100
products.description: Obsessed with perfecting your craft? We made this for you. In the middle of the storm, with chaos swirling all around you, you've calmly found the final third of the field, thanks to your uncanny mix of on-ball guile and grace. Go finish the job in the Phantom Luna 2 Elite. Revolutionary Nike Gripknit covers the striking area of the cleat while Nike Cyclone 360 traction helps guide your unscripted agility. We design Elite cleats for you and the world's biggest stars to give you high-level quality, because you demand greatness from yourself and your footwear. Exceptional Touch:Nike Gripknit is a sticky material that provides exceptional touch to the ball. It covers the striking area of the cleat, stretching from the big-toe side all the way across the laces to the pinky toe, allowing clean boot-to-ball kicks. It molds to the shape of your foot and gives you great grip in wet or dry conditions. Micro-molding texture works with Gripknit to help form to your foot for even better cleat-to-ball strikes. Quick Traction:Nike Cyclone 360 traction pattern helps you make quicker (improved agility when making cuts) and confident (helps reduce rotational traction) movements, so you can cut with speed while feeling fully secure when the game's intensity turns up. Snug Fit:Asymmetric lacing offers a large touch surface when dribbling, passing and scoring. A repositioned lacing pattern allows for increased midfoot adjustability to accommodate players with flatter or higher arches. Asymmetrical Flyknit cuff material provides snugness and shape around your ankle. Subtle ribs in the cuff allow for ball contact higher up the ankle in trapping and passing. Product Details:For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields. Cushioned insole. Style: FJ2572; Color: White/Metallic Gold Coin/Black; Size: 5.5; Gender: Male; Age Group: Adult | Nike Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in White, Size: 5.5 | FJ2572-100

products.name: Nike Men's Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Firm-Ground High-Top Soccer Cleats in Yellow, Size: 6.5 | DJ4977-700
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Firm-Ground High-Top Soccer Cleats in Yellow, Size: 6.5 | DJ4977-700
products.unbrandedName: Men's Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Firm-Ground High-Top Soccer Cleats in Yellow, Size: 6.5 | DJ4977-700
products.description: Instantly tilt the field in the bold design of the Superfly 9 Elite FG. We added a Zoom Air unit, made specifically for soccer, and grippy texture up top for exceptional touch, so you can dominate in the waning minutes of a match—when it matters most. Feel the explosive speed as you race around the field, making the critical plays with velocity and pace. Fast is in the Air. Welcome to the Field, Zoom:For the first time in our history, Nike has developed an all-new, soccer-specific 3/4 Zoom Air unit. It sits in the plate and provides an additional level of springy underfoot feel that helps you move faster on the field and create separation when it matters the most—whether you're scoring goals, being first to the ball or going by defenders. Drive Your Speed:The speed cage inside of the structure is made of a thin but strong material that secures the foot to the outsole without adding additional weight for optimal lockdown. Dig In, Take Off:Tri-star studs provide multidirectional traction with every step, so you can change directions quickly and confidently. Heel studs provide traction and stability when braking. Toe-off center studs give you traction during explosive starts. Improved Fit:Flyknit wraps your ankle in soft, stretchy fabric for a secure feel. A redone design improves the fit, so that it better simulates the foot. We did this by conducting multiple wear tests on hundreds of athletes. The result is a more contoured toe box and better lockdown in the heel. Feel the Ball:The upper is made of Vaporposite+, which combines a grippy, grid mesh with a premium material for optimal ball control at high speeds. The material provides a tactile feel across the surface of the upper. It's soft, but stable and wraps tightly around your foot, giving you a more natural on-ball feel when dribbling, passing or scoring. Product Details:For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields. Cushioned insole. Style: DJ4977; Color: Lemonade/Black; Size: 6.5; Gender: Male; Age Group: Adult | Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Firm-Ground High-Top Soccer Cleats in Yellow, Size: 6.5 | DJ4977-700

products.description: black signature 3-Stripes logo logo patch to the side round toe front lace-up fastening pull-tab at the heel branded insole flatform sole This piece comes complete with a protective dust bag. We've partnered with Good On You — an independent agency that rates how brands perform in relation to their impact on the planet, people and animals, with a multi-criteria rating simplified to a five points scale. In order to be awarded our conscious label, larger brands need to score a minimum of four out of five ('Good'), while smaller brands must score at least three out of five ('It's A Start'). This item comes from a brand rated three out of five ('It's A Start') by Good on You at the time it was added on FARFETCH. Please note, this is a brand-level rating and does not guarantee that this product is made with conscious materials. Learn more about what makes a product Conscious on our Conscious Criteria page
